entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 12:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snow over higher terrain in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm except 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Snow over higher terrain early in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
